attributes.action: Stop Insurance Companies charging up 30% APR to pay monthly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All Insurance companies charge up to 30% APR for choosing to pay by direct debit. It is illegal to drive a car without Insurance and Mortgage companies will not give you a mortgage without buildings insurance.  Therefore Insurance should be classed as a utility bill and therefore they should not penalise us for choosing to pay monthly
